00044 class EGS_Input;
00045 
00067 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_RandomGenerator {
00068 
00069 public:
00070 
00078     EGS_RandomGenerator(int n=128);
00079 
00085     EGS_RandomGenerator(const EGS_RandomGenerator &r) : np(0) {
00086         copyBaseState(r);
00087     };
00088 
00093     virtual ~EGS_RandomGenerator() { delete [] rarray; };
00094 
00101     inline EGS_Float getUniform() {
00102         if( ip >= np ) { fillArray(np,rarray); ip = 0; }
00103         return rarray[ip++];
00104     };
00105 
00111     EGS_I64 numbersGenerated() const { return count; };
00112 
00118     EGS_I64 numbersUsed() const { return ip<np ? count - np + ip : count; };
00119 
00129     inline void getAzimuth(EGS_Float &cphi, EGS_Float &sphi) {
00130 #ifndef FAST_SINCOS
00131         register EGS_Float xphi,xphi2,yphi,yphi2,rhophi;
00132         do {
00133             xphi = 2*getUniform() - 1; xphi2 = xphi*xphi;
00134             yphi = getUniform(); yphi2 = yphi*yphi;
00135             rhophi = xphi2 + yphi2;
00136         } while ( rhophi > 1 );
00137         cphi = (xphi2 - yphi2)/rhophi;
00138         sphi = 2*xphi*yphi/rhophi;
00139 #else
00140         EGS_Float phi = 2*M_PI*getUniform();
00141         cphi = cos(phi); sphi = sin(phi);
00142 #endif
00143     };
00144 
00148     inline EGS_Float getGaussian() {
00149         if( have_x ) { have_x = false; return the_x; }
00150         EGS_Float r = sqrt(-2*log(1-getUniform()));
00151         EGS_Float cphi, sphi; getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00152         have_x = true; the_x = r*sphi; return r*cphi;
00153     };
00154 
00169     static EGS_RandomGenerator* createRNG(EGS_Input *inp, int sequence=0);
00170 
00177     static EGS_RandomGenerator* defaultRNG(int sequence=0);
00178 
00190     virtual void fillArray(int n, EGS_Float *array) = 0;
00191 
00193 
00194 
00208     bool storeState(ostream &data);
00209     bool setState(istream &data);
00210     bool addState(istream &data);
00211     void resetCounter() { count = 0; };
00213

00216 
00218     virtual void setState(EGS_RandomGenerator *r) = 0;
00219 
00221     virtual void saveState() = 0;

00227     virtual int  rngSize() const = 0;

00235     virtual void describeRNG() const {};

00263 
00264     void copyBaseState(const EGS_RandomGenerator &r);
00265 
00266     void allocate(int n);
00267 
00269     int  baseSize() const {
00270         return 2*sizeof(EGS_I32) + sizeof(EGS_I64) + sizeof(bool) +
00271                sizeof(EGS_Float) + np*sizeof(EGS_Float);
00272     };
00273
